title: Fragments, 1770–80
medium:
Cotton, plain weave. 
Printed by engraved plate.
dimensions:
A. Warp:46.5cm (181/4in.). Weft:91cm (35 7/8in.).
B. Warp: 46cm (18 1/8in.). Weft: 77cm (30 1/4in.).
C. Warp: 32.5cm (12 3/4in.). Weft: 33cm (13in.).
D. Warp: 27cm (10 5/8in.). Weft: 59cm (23 3/16in.).
description: Four fragments of a design of a stag hunt. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 1770–80.
1770–80. Cotton, plain weave. 
Printed by engraved plate.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-137-a/d.
